title: Revolution LF  Top & Support ( Diamond Pref)
body:
Hi Guys,

We are currently looking for another support ( Sub) and a top laner who can commit to a 5 day a week schedule.

Our times as follow:
Sunday- Thursday = 6pm-12am
This will include doing reviews and practicing in these time slots. 

Although the support role is currently a sub role there is good chance for you to become the starting support pending availabilities. We use Teamspeak as a way to communicate in game and are after someone with a positive attitude in and out of the game. 

If you think are interested please either add myself or post here.

Thanks.

replies.body: Hey guys I'd be keen to play, im plat 3 and climbing, i main aggressive AD top laners e.g. riven, irelia but i can also play some solid maokai or rumble. happy to commit to your schedule, i communicate well and dont tilt. add me in game if youre interested
